import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import productData from '../../data/ProductData'; import productsAll from '../../data/ProductsAll'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import 'swiper/swiper-bundle.min.css'; import './ProductDetail.css'; function ProductDetail() { const { productId } = useParams(); const product = productData.find(p => p.id === parseInt(productId)); if (!product) { return
Product not found
; } const relatedProducts = productsAll.filter( (relatedProduct) => relatedProduct.id !== product.id ).slice(0, 4); return (
Home / Gaming /

{product.name}

{product.name}

{product.reviews}

{product.stockStatus}

${product.price}

{product.description}

Colors:

{product.delivery}
{product.postalCode}
{product.return}

{product.returnPolicy}Details

Related Items

{/* Swiper Slider for Responsive View */} {relatedProducts.map((relatedProduct) => (

{relatedProduct.name}

${relatedProduct.price}

{relatedProduct.rating}

 {relatedProduct.color && ( )}
))}
); } export default ProductDetail;
